name: react-avatar
description: Universal avatar makes it possible to fetch/generate an avatar based on the information you have about that user.

scripts.build: browserify src/index.js -o lib/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 react ] ]
scripts.demo: browserify src/demo.js -o lib/demo.js -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 react ] ]
scripts.dev: watchify src/demo.js -o lib/demo.js -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 react ] ]

author: Wim Mostmans <wim@sitebase.be>
